name: BUILD FROM WITHIN ALLIANCE
description: Neighborhood revitalization and entrepreneurial development in low-income communities
sampleDescriptions: Educating Members of Congress on the work of the Build from Within Alliance (BfWA), and the Build from Within neighborhood revitalization model. Serving as a resource to BfWA member organizations seek
